tts.speech: Attention please! Have a nice day!
tts._comment: This will start at least 0 minutes after execution and run until the end of execution, saying 'Attention please! Have a nice day!' every 15-20 minutes
After 60 minutes, but until 80, this will pick a random phrase from speech every 3-5 minutes, not repeating a phrase. If it runs out, it will not run again.
